text: this is part of the Cape Fear Leonce
missile defense complex now about a week
ago Russian troops came in here there
was a tense standoff for several days
between the Russians and their Ukrainian
counterparts but then last night the
Russian troops simply melted away I've
been asking the Deputy Ukrainian
commander in the base to explain what
happened sure
that's about midnight the Russian troops
who were in our base apparently received
a command they gathered there things got
in their vehicles and 15 minutes later
they were gone right now there are only
Ukrainians here it's difficult when
there are foreign troops on your base
but we carried on doing our jobs even
though they were better armed than we
are the Ukrainian flag flies over the
base for now at least but the Ukrainian
troops here don't know when or if the
Russians might come back and so they say
that's why everywhere they go they carry
their guns with them so what's happened
here it does seem to represent a slight
loosening of Russia's military grip in
the Crimea and perhaps an easing of
tension
